main.name: Doug Moore
main.description: Application Developer / Full Stack React Developer
main.bio: My name is Doug, I'm a Full Stack ReactJS Developer. A detail-oriented and collaborative Consultant Application Developer with extensive experience in the financial industry. Recently certified for Full Stack Web Development. Reliable team player skilled in multiple programming languages, Oracle Database, Data Warehousing, and Reporting tools. Strong analytical skills support a proven ability to effectively resolve problems.  Applies an active listening approach to encourage productive teamwork while developing and maintaining effective working relationships across an organization.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

resume.skillmessage: HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, NodeJS, React, MongoDB, MySQL, Java, SQL, Oracle, Bootstrap

education.school: University of Toronto Schoold of Contuining Studies

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Doug Moore must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
